website_summaries.verdict: A great vegan option that uses a combination of mushroom varieties for their benefits to hair, skin, and nails.
pros: Fits a wide variety of diets since it is vegan, non GMO, organic, gluten free, kosher, and paleo friendly
Since it is grown, milled, and packaged in Carlsbad, CA, you can trust its manufacturing
With a serving size of just 1 tsp, it will be easy to add to your daily diet
cons: A higher price for the package, but it could be worth it for the ingredients
Users note that the flavor is "mushroomy" so it works best in savory foods

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this after I found out I was vitamin D deficient.... and I'm totally fine now. The bonus is that my hair is growing in more around my temples where it was thinner and my skin is a lot less dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer BIlton

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Free 2 day Sunday dilivery!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! Helps with radiance of skin and length of nails. Also feeling of inner comfort is stronger when taking this. Great in a morning smoothie. Ordering was simple and it was delivered FREE in two days, Sunday delivery. Price is by far, BEST with AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great I add to my smoothie every morning good stuff I recommend no issues with packaging arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Brightpink In LA

customer_reviews.title: Flavor too horrible to take
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is too horrible to ingest as recommended. I would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for health
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well into orange juice and doesn’t have much of taste
customer_reviews.author: Betty June

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff: )
customer_reviews.text: My hair stopped falling out..what more is there to say ! Great stuff :)
customer_reviews.author: maziey

customer_reviews.title: I was really hoping to have the great results that some people have and certainly like some ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to have the great results that some people have and certainly like some of the more pricey mushroom proteins out there. Unfortunately though it tasted ok, I don't believe I got any great results and definitely don't feel more beautiful. :(
customer_reviews.author: Am9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only products that has helped my split nails.
customer_reviews.author: s Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this supplement! I put it in my smoothies and oatmeal and can barely taste it.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: This powder is full of starch! Returning it!
customer_reviews.text: This powder is full of starch and it is not clean mushroom powder. I just did the testing. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor, has helped my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Beauty version for a few months now. I'm not sure I notice a huge difference in my skin and nails, but I enjoy the earthy flavor in my coffee every morning and I've actually seen a decrease of IBS incidents. I use half a tsp and it has lasted me 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Shorted on quantity.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this beauty one has less in it than my other three mushroom powders. It was the last one I purchased and first to be empty using a scoop a day of each. Rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene G. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: I can think clearly again.
customer_reviews.text: Love all the om products! Delivers every time! I have Lyme disease. This product helps with brain fog. My nails and skin. I’ve been using this product for about 4 years. I won’t go without it.
customer_reviews.author: lois capossela

customer_reviews.title: This is very good product for me
customer_reviews.text: This is very good product for me. I have problem with psoriasis on my scalp. This powder helped me solve this problem, now I have clear head, no more dry skin...I have been using it for 7 months. I usually mix it with yogurt or kefir, it tastes good. I am very happy with that!!! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Causes smelly gas
customer_reviews.text: If you want really bad smelling gas then these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t noticed a huge difference and I use it every day
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: I took the dosage as recommended on the packing
customer_reviews.text: This made me break out! I took the dosage as recommended on the packing, and within a few days, I broke out. I stopped taking the mix. A couple of weeks later, I started taking the mix again and I broke out. I stopped using it. A few weeks later, I decided to give it another try and I had the worst break out of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Smile!

customer_reviews.title: Long time user
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every day for a year, I love this for my skin and nails. I am vegan and use it in conjunction with Sibu Sea Berry Omega 7 dropper oil for even better results
customer_reviews.author: H Lau

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The taste does not blend well. Haven't used it long/often enough to notice any differences.
customer_reviews.author: Andre M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Saw improvement in nail strength and hair growth. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My skin has a super high turn over rate and my hair grows faster than ever...it's a bit expensive but I just use a bit once a day...if you overdo it it's going to get flushed down the toilet.. just start small and add until you see results...it takes about a week to notice anything
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't have been bad if there was a baby hole in the bag and leaked in box.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't bother with a replacement. such a small content. and baby hole in the bag. Wasn't worth the hassle to get another. taste and feeling was not too bad. I only just tried one serving. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara Perugini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for nail health
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely write product reviews, but am really pleased with this one! I have noticed a huge difference in the health of my nails (growth & strength)–would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Lepage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as stated - other people noticed - unsolicited- an improvement particularly how skin looked
customer_reviews.author: Mike Benjamin

product_meta.title: Om Organic Mushroom Superfood Powder, Beauty: Hair Skin Nails, 7.05 Ounce (100 Servings), Chaga, Cordyceps & Maitake, Antioxidants, Immune Support Supplement
product_meta.description: Flavor:Beauty| Size:7.05 Ounce (Pack of 1)Go radical on free radicals and exude your natural radiance with Chaga, an adaptogen revered for its sacred antioxidants. It's beautifully blended with four organic mushroom species to support glowing skin, lustrous hair and strong nails. Mushrooms look good on you.
feature_bullets: Contains 1 jar (200g) of Om Mushroom Beauty Superfood Powder
Certified 100% organic, non GMO, gluten free, vegan
Nutritional power to shine from the inside out
Defy aging, antioxidants to prevent free radical damage. Naturally occurring beta glucans.
Because at Om, mushrooms are our mantra. Ommm.
